alert.note: Alert for Estill; Powell (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 19 at 3:44AM EST until February 19 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...Observed flooding changed from Minor to Moderate severity and increased in duration for the following rivers in Kentucky... Red River at Clay City affecting Powell and Estill Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Red River at Clay City. * WHEN...Until this morning. * IMPACTS...At 17.0 feet, Low lying areas flood. Maple street near the Red River Ranch as well as Pompeii Road off of Highway 15 are impassable. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:15 AM EST Sunday the stage was 17.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage early this morning and continue falling to 4.8 feet Thursday evening. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. The next statement will be issued by 7 AM EST.
